original_text: Absalom had three sons and one daughter. Her name was Tamar. She was a very beautiful woman.
korean_text: 압살롬이 아들 셋과 딸 하나를 낳았는데 딸의 이름은 다말이라 그는 얼굴이 아름다운 여자더라

sentences.original_text: Absalom had three sons and one daughter.
sentences.korean_translation: 압살롬에게는 아들 세 명과 딸 한 명이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: She was a very beautiful woman.
